text:
The thing
that I will describe is not a real thing it is just an invention so it is not
real. This invention is a humanoid robot named Alex Dupont. Alex Dupont is a humanoid robot
who is used to clean the house and all the tasks in a house.  He is able to clean for example the floor, the
windows, a table, the wall … all the tasks in the house. This robot is able to
clean something by himself when he see something to clean, he is autonomous. But
I can also have the total control on this robot and tell him what he needed to
clean by a mobile application. When he has finished to clean or when he is low
battery he can recharge himself on a power outlet or in a sort a little place
who is wireless, like phones you put on a little thing who recharge battery in
induction. It is the same thing but with the robot size. So it is on his feet.
The size of the robot is like a middle size of human people.
 If this
robot was real I think he will have not a huge impact in the society but of
course at the beginning of his production and when he is sail, there will have
a media impact because it can be an event in the world. Because the question of
robot have many interrogation in our society. We now that it can help us in
lots of domain but it also have question in terms of control of the technology.
I think lots of people will ask if we can control this robot for other thing
and not just for a house. I think lots of people will ask this for security and
safety of the consumers and people who have buy the robot. People will ask if
other can control for bad things, I think. Because it is an humanoid robot. So
this robot will have most a media impact but not a real impact on the society,
maybe some countries will be not available to sail the product safety
questions.
